result.eng: He boys were wearing short trousers.
result.ga: Bhí brístí gearra ar na buachaillí
result.orig: Bhí brístí gearra ar na buachaillí
result.html: Bhí brístí gearra ar na buachaillíHe boys were wearing short trousers.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí brístí gearra ar na buaċaillíHe boys were wearing short trousers.

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?
result.ga: Fan go bhfeice mé - seisear buachaillí agus ceathrar cailíní An bhfuil an ceart agam

result.ponchtml: Fan go ḃfeice mé - seisear buaċaillí agus ceaṫrar cailíní An ḃfuil an ceart agam[Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?
